scripts.generate:low-code-connector: pnpm js-yaml low-code-connector.schema.yaml | npx quicktype -s schema -l typescript --just-types --prefer-unions --top-level LowCodeConnector > low-code-connector.schema.ts
scripts.generate:protocol: pnpm js-yaml protocol.schema.yaml | npx quicktype -s schema -l typescript --just-types --prefer-unions --top-level AirbyteProtocol > protocol.schema.ts
